name: Amnesty High
description:
Amnesty High is a fan game for "The Adventure Zone: Amnesty." I made it in a week for class, so I figured that if I can't make a good game in that amount of time, I might as well make an absolutely awful game. This is not at all meant to be taken seriously and I highly doubt that anyone will actually play it. But, if you do, be prepared for a mixture of those awful mobile dating games and bad fan fiction. Enjoy!

I don't own the characters featured in this game. All characters and names belong to the McElroys.
